tool_description: Creates recurring schedule patterns based on user preferences, available time, and cleaning requirements.

base_frequency.description: Primary recurrence (daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, quarterly)

preferred_days.description: Preferred days of week (monday, tuesday, etc.)

flexibility_level.description: How rigid the schedule is (strict, moderate, flexible)

error_messages: Invalid base_frequency: Must be one of [daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, quarterly]
Invalid day names: Days must be full names (monday, tuesday, etc.)
Invalid preferred_times: Must be one of [morning, afternoon, evening]
Invalid flexibility_level: Must be one of [strict, moderate, flexible]
usage: Create frequency patterns that will be applied to different tasks and rooms. Consider your lifestyle and availability.

next_occurrences.description: Next 5 scheduled dates in ISO format
